name: Old Geek's Guide
tagline: Some things old, some things new . . . .
body:
### twitter: [@OldGeeksGuide](https://twitter.com/oldgeeksguide)

### Recent Blog posts:
* [Object Observation without Objection](https://software.intel.com/en-us/blogs/2015/09/22/object-observation-without-objection)
* [Heading Home with the Intel XDK](https://software.intel.com/en-us/html5/blogs/heading-home-with-the-intel-xdk)
* [Using the Dolby API in the Intel XDK](https://software.intel.com/en-us/html5/blogs/using-the-dolby-api-in-the-intel-xdk)
* [Cordova Plugins and the Dolby API](http://goo.gl/QYSJnz)
* [Taking Command of Javascript](https://software.intel.com/en-us/html5/blogs/taking-command-of-javascript)

### Articles:
* [10 Ecmascript-6 tricks you can perform right now](http://html5hub.com/10-ecmascript-6-tricks-you-can-perform-right-now/)
    - Recent versions of Firefox have pretty good ES6 support, check it out.


### WebApp to DesktopApp with Node-Webkit:
* [Video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d2tYH7vXMUM) - HTML5 Dev Conf presentation, October 2013
* [Slides](http://oldgeeksguide.github.io/presentations/html5devconf2013/wtod.html)
    - The first half may be hard to parse without seeing the presentation, but the second half contains lots of useful examples.

### Old Geek's Guide to Javascript:
* [Basic Javascript](http://software.intel.com/en-us/html5/blogs/basic-javascript)
* [Basic Javascript Patterns](http://software.intel.com/en-us/html5/blogs/basic-javascript-patterns)
* [Static Javascript Patterns](http://software.intel.com/en-us/html5/blogs/static-javascript-patterns)
* [Javascript Class Patterns](http://software.intel.com/en-us/html5/blogs/javascript-class-patterns)
* [More Javascript Class Patterns](http://software.intel.com/en-us/html5/blogs/new-javascript-class-patterns)
* [Javascript: This, That And The Other Thing](http://software.intel.com/en-us/html5/blogs/javascript-this-that-and-the-other-thing)
* [Strictly Speaking Javascript](http://software.intel.com/en-us/blogs/2013/07/12/strictly-speaking-javascript)
* [Jquery - The Birth Of Cool Javascript](http://software.intel.com/en-us/blogs/2013/07/19/jquery-the-birth-of-cool-javascript)
* [JSON Is The New XML (But Better)](http://software.intel.com/en-us/blogs/2013/07/26/json-is-the-new-xml-but-better)

### Old Geek's Guide to SVG:
* [SVG - Turtles All The Way Down](http://software.intel.com/en-us/blogs/2013/08/02/svg-turtles-all-the-way-down)
* [Viewbox: A Window Into The Soul Of SVG](http://software.intel.com/en-us/blogs/2013/08/09/viewbox-a-window-into-the-soul-of-svg)
* [All Paths Lead To SVG](http://software.intel.com/en-us/blogs/2013/08/15/all-paths-lead-to-svg)
* [Roll Your Own Filtered SVG](http://software.intel.com/en-us/blogs/2013/09/06/roll-your-own-filtered-svg)
* [SVG Filters - Putting Pieces Together](http://software.intel.com/en-us/blogs/2013/09/12/svg-filters-putting-pieces-together)
